snippet: The police said a man punched three people including a 69-year-old man who was taken to the hospital, where he remained in “very serious condition.”
abstract: New York City Police Department is investigating rapid series of assaults by Martin Redrick in Union Square Park as possible hate crimes; Redrick punched three people in park and reportedly declared his intention to 'punch the first white man I see.'
lead_paragraph: The police said a man punched three people including a 69-year-old man who was taken to the hospital, where he remained in “very serious condition.”

headline.main: Assaults at Union Sq. Park May Be Hate Crimes
headline.print_headline: Assaults at Union Sq. Park May Be Hate Crimes
